title: All Squash Time Tournaments in one place
description: Log in to create Player's account and register for Squash Time in one click. Visit Tournaments page to view upcoming tournaments across all locations.
header_description: Log in to create Player's account and register for Squash Time in one click. Visit Tournaments page to view upcoming tournaments across all locations.
features_title: Manage and track your Squash Time experience
features_description: Once Sign In, you receive your Squash Time Player account for free. You can use it to join the game, track the score and watch your progress. Real time.
features_1_description: Every game in the shedule is displayed with location and time. Choose the best option.
features_2_description: You can view players of any game — real-time or scheduled. Keep an eye on the competitors.
features_3_description: All players are placed at rating according to their score. See how do you compare.
features_4_description: Once the game is live, coaches fil out the table. See your results faster that you leave the court.
footer_subscribe_description: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
footer_all_rights: © 2021 Squash Time, Inc. All rights reserved.
